term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - σ → σ* transition
term.title: σ → σ* transition

item.text: An electronic transition described approximately as promotion of an electron from a 'bonding' σ orbital to an 'antibonding' σ orbital designated as σ *. Such transitions generally involve high transition energies, and appear close to or mixed with Rydberg transitions.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2279 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
